ShipLogDictionary.GFB_WRAITH_SHIP_SEEN_TEXT: When I woke up, I saw a strange ringed planet orbiting Giant's Deep.
ShipLogDictionary.GFB_CRASH_VISITED_TEXT: I found a crash site on Hollow's Lantern where one of the inhabitants of the Stranger apparently died.
ShipLogDictionary.GFB_CRASH_VISION_TEXT: I watched the vision left behind by the dead inhabitant. She fled the Stranger with a wraith-like creature in hopes of finding the Eye of the Universe. More of those wraiths were sealed away to power mechanisms within the Stranger.
